select (select tc.code_content from tb_code tc where tc.code_id = tp.solution_id) as "solution", (select count(*) from tb_point tp2 where tp2.post_type = 'Q' and tp2.solution_id = tp.solution_id ) as "question", (select count(*) from tb_point tp2 where tp2.post_type = 'A' and tp2.solution_id = tp.solution_id ) as "answer", (select count(tq2.question_id ) - count(tq2.answer_id ) from tb_question tq2 where tq2.solution_id = tp.solution_id ) as "notSuccess", (select count(tq3.score ) from tb_question tq3 where tq3.solution_id = tp.solution_id and tq3.score is not null ) as "scoreCount", to_char(avg(tb_qa.score), 'FM9.0') as "avgScore", concat(to_char(AVG(tb_qa.tadate - tb_qa.tqdate), 'DD'), ' 일') as "dueDate", (select sum(tp3.point_value ) from tb_point tp3 where tp3.solution_id = tp.solution_id ) as "point" from tb_point tp join (select ta.reg_date as "tadate", tq.reg_date as "tqdate", tq.score as "score", tq.solution_id as "solution" from tb_question tq left join tb_answer ta on tq.answer_id = ta.answer_id) as TB_QA on TB_QA.SOLUTION = TP.solution_id where 1=1
and tp.reg_date between to_timestamp(concat(#{sDate},' 00:00:00'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.MS') and to_timestamp(concat(#{eDate},' 23:59:59'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.MS')
group by TP.solution_id

select (select tu.user_name from tb_user tu where tu.user_id = tp.user_id ) as "userName", (select tu.user_id from tb_user tu where tu.user_id = tp.user_id ) as "user_id", (select count(*) from tb_point tp3 where tp3.post_type = 'Q' and tp3.user_id = tp.user_id ) as "question", (select count(*) from tb_point tp4 where tp4.post_type = 'A' and tp4.user_id = tp.user_id ) as "answer", (select count(*) from tb_question tq2 where tq2.reg_userid = tp.user_id and tq2.score is not null) as "scoreCount", to_CHAR(avg(tb_up.p_score), 'FM9.0') as "avgScore", (select SUM(tp5.point_value) from tb_point tp5 where tp5.user_id = tp.user_id group by tp5.user_id) as "point" from tb_point tp left join (select ta.reg_userid as userid, foo.s as p_score from tb_answer ta inner join (select tq.answer_id as a , tq.score as s from tb_question tq where tq.score is not null )as foo on foo.a = ta.answer_id ) as tb_up on tb_up.userid = tp.user_id where 1=1
and tp.reg_date between to_timestamp(concat(#{sDate},' 00:00:00'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.MS') and to_timestamp(concat(#{eDate},' 23:59:59'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.MS')
group by tp.user_id order by TP.user_id

select to_char(tp.reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi') as "dueDate", TC.code_type as "action", TU.user_name as "userName", tp.point_value as "point", (select tc.code_content from tb_code tc where tc.code_content = #{sol} ) as "solution", (select ta.title from tb_answer ta where ta.answer_id = tp.post_id ) as "title" from tb_point tp left join tb_code TC on TC.code_id = TP.act_code left join tb_user TU on TU.user_id = TP.user_id where 1=1 and tp.solution_id = (select tc2.code_id from tb_code tc2 where tc2.code_content = #{sol}) and tp.post_type = 'A'
and tp.reg_date between to_timestamp(concat(#{sDate},' 00:00:00'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.MS') and to_timestamp(concat(#{eDate},' 23:59:59'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.MS')
